string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I want you to meet with someone. He will have a job for you. Do it and don't ask any questions. Got it?
Good luck stalker.
Retrieve Lock Box for Sultan
Sultan wants the contents of the case back. It's due in 24 hours.

I need you to bring me one suitcase. It's in the stash. Whatever else is in the stash is all yours, but the case belongs to me, and if I find out someone else has it, you'll lose your head instantly. You got a deal? You get the reward, don't be afraid. I want this box here in 24 hours.
Excellent! You have done well.
Sultan's Enemy
The sultan wants revenge on the stalker who dumped him. The deadline is 12 hours.

One stalker rat crossed my path twice. No one dares to ruin a relationship with me and then live long enough to see the next sunrise. Kill the asshole, you got 12 hours before he gets away. Where are you gonna hide from me, though? Heh.
Good. I should have told you to leave his head on a pike. No matter, everyone knows not to mess with Sultan. Here is your reward.
Kill the Rat
A fellow bandit has betrayed us. Sultan wants him eliminated. The deadline is 12 hours.

There is a traitor in our midst. One of our own has betrayed us, but he doesn't yet know that I know. He'll be easy to get; just walk up to him, point your pistol at his face and pull the trigger. Just watch out for how his buddies react, you'll probably have to kill them too. Talk to me again when he sleeps with the worms. You've got half a day for everything.
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Search Lab X-16
Sultan has a buyer for some documents located inside Lab X-16 in Yantar.

I have a customer who is willing to pay well for some documents located inside that creepy lab over in Yantar. None of these pussies want to go in there because they think it is haunted. If you can get me those documents I'll give you half of what he is paying me. What do you say? Or are you afraid of ghosts too?
Well done. Here is your cut.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Sorry, you must have the wrong guy. If you want to buy something, go ahead, but otherwise you can go bother someone else.
Good luck stalker.
%s Smuggler
Olivius needs %s smuggled past the military.

You know my contact in the Military? The one who used to look the other way when I brought weapons through the checkpoint? Can you believe that son of a bitch wants to start charging me a percentage? Fuck him. I want you to get my next shipment and sneak it past him.
Go pick up {item_name}. Get them past that little shit and I'll make it worth your while.
Yes, you have done well. Here's your cut.
Kill the Double-Crosser
Olivius was double-crossed by a member of the Military and needs him to be taken care of.

You know our friend in the Military? The one who used to let us run weapons past the checkpoint if we slipped him a carton of cigarettes? That little shit now says he wants me to start paying a percentage every time or else he's going to turn us in. Who the hell does he think he's dealing with? I want him dead, you hear me? Dead! Your time is 24 hours. Bring me his head!
Good. Fuck that guy.
Pay Tribute To Sultan To Join Bandits
Sultan will let you join the Bandits but first you must pay him a 5,000 UAH tribute.
You want to be a Bandit? Well, first you must pay tribute to Sultan... 5,000 UAH. I don't trust you so I want it up front.
Very good. Grab a vodka and go meet your fellow Bandits. They're the finest scumbags in the Zone.
Assassinate target
Find and eliminate the target then return to Sultan for payment. The deadline is 12 hours.

It's not yet clear who's boss in the Zone! And someone still thinks they can throw me away with impunity or disrespect me in any way. Some owe me money, some screwed up important deals... They're all nothing more than rats to be stomped on. You can't leave them alive, you show me weakness, and hello, come. Anyway, we've got to find them and clean them up quickly, you've got 12 hours. If you do, I'll mark the target on your PDA.
Great work! Here's a little something for your trouble:
Eliminate the Military Presence
Sultan wants you to eliminate any Military personnel in the area.
Those oak-headed warriors crawling here again, I don't like it. Go take care of them before you go. You've got six hours.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Stalker Elimination
Eliminate the stalkers that attacked a fellow bandit.
One of our brothers was attacked by a Fray. We've got to work something out with them, and quickly, before they take off, so you have 6 hours.
Done? Good.
Eliminate Mutant Threat in Dark Valley
Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Olivius after the job is done.

We've been looking for someone with enough balls to clear out mutants in a few places. Stalkers aren't coming around here because they are too afraid. If we don't do something about it we won't have anyone left to 'borrow' any goods from, then we will have to move out of this territory.
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Eliminate Territorial Threat
It is necessary to destroy the enemy detachment at this point. The deadline is 24 hours.

We've got a bitch on us again, we've got a bad rod, we can barely fight back. So the godfather told us to find a couple of normal guys to fix these fags, and a couple of camps to fight back. So I remembered you right away, you're gonna fucking kill them all, but don't drag it out, the deadline is a day. Well, what do you think? Won't you hush it up?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Chiki-Briki i v Damke
It is necessary to arrange a safari for beginners. Take them around the neighborhood and cover them until they shoot.

Long story short, two of some authoritative from the Big Land decided to arrange here a "safari". So, somebody should took them around the neighborhood. Yes, somebody should take a look what their heads didn't chew off while those mutants were being sniffed around. They seem to offer great money for this case, so the work is worth it. Do you take it?
Nice walk, eh? Here is your part.
Hitman
Olivius has contracted you to run a hit. Find and eliminate the target then return to him for payment.

There's one thing that came up, just for you. There's a guy who's making a big fuss. The authority's trying to make money. A bazaar of rottenness leads behind my brother's eyes, he's pushing me down, and he's got no idea what's wrong with his brother. You dig this shit up, you're not leaving empty-handed. Fuck who's not nerdy and Olivius is in charge of the bazaar! You're gonna get a pretty good job... You just have to dig it up quietly, without any bubbles. The time limit is two days for you.
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I'm in desperate need of new tools, man. I can't do anything with the rusty shit I have and I'm running out of gun oil. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Perfect! This is just what I need, man. I can properly upgrade gear now!
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an {item_name}. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, here is some money.
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an {item_name}. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, here is some money.
Lead the way and we will follow. You will get your cut when we are done. Just make sure we are the ones doing the looting and watch our backs.
We should get moving - my trigger finger is getting itchy. Just remember, we get the loot!
You did your job well. Here is your cut.
Okay.
